Definition: Given an amazon food product review and its polarity (positive or negative), you are to answer "True" if the specified sentence and its polarity match. A match means that the sentence has the same positive or negative sentiment as the review. If the sentence does not have the same sentiment, then the answer is "False".

Positive Examples.input:
I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most. 
 Polarity: Positive
Positive Examples.explanation: It's a positive review because the owner of the dog is satisfied with the product and mentioned that their dog appreciates the product. Also, the polarity is positive. So, the correct answer is True.

Positive Examples.input:
Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo". 
 Polarity: Negative
Positive Examples.explanation: It's a Negative Review because the customer gets something else than what he expected. So, the correct answer is True

Positive Examples.input:
I thought this was a great buy, but as noted by Scott D., the molasses content was not up to par.  I loved the higher molasses content "Sugar in the Raw".  Unfortunately what I purchased recently does not have the higher molasses content and I have twelve 24 ounce bags.  I guess I'll watch for the next crop. 
 Polarity: Positive
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer is really unsatisfied with the product so it's not a positive review. So, the correct answer is False.

Negative Examples.input:
My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers. 
 Polarity: Positive
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to say if the Polarity of given review is "True" or "False".

Negative Examples.input:
I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags. 
 Polarity: Positive
Negative Examples.explanation: This review is positive review. Because the customer finds what they wanted. So, the correct answer would be true because it's a positive review.

Negative Examples.input:
My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat. 
 Polarity: Positive
Negative Examples.explanation: This review is negative review. Because the cat is not eating the food ordered by the owner. So, the correct answer would be false because it's a negative review.

Instances.input:
I like Japanese soups and just love the similar products from San-J (also available from Amazon -- get those, they're 5-star!).  This Miso-cup brand is terrible. I can't tell you more than this is just yicky. I wish there was a zero-star rating!  I didn't finish the first cup even (but I'd already tried and re-tried another Miso-cup flavor and hated it). Therefore, I only used one envelope before giving away the rest. Oh, why did I stray from San-J? Actually, I thought it might be worth trying Miso-cup's different flavors to add variety to my afternoon broth experience. It was this flavor, in particular, that I was most interested in trying for variety. But now I know that ALL the Miso-cup brand are equally dreadful!!!  I gave these and the other Miso-cup boxes to a Food Pantry BUT I told them first why to warn others it might not suit them. Get the San-J brand!!! 
 Polarity: Negative

This product is amazing. I know a few people with little ones that use these and they LOVE them!! Super easy to clean and use. When ordering these, I was under the impression that there were 2 per package...FYI-they're not!! Only one per... 
 Polarity: Positive

I was soooo disappointed by this product. They would not take! I guess I should have suspected from the low price. I had gotten fresh pablanos shortly before and they were WONDERFUL, but these are not. I know these are terribly hard to find ,thats why I took a chance, but do not waste your time on this product. (scoring & soaking will not help) 
 Polarity: Positive

I must be a bit of a wuss, because this soup tastes to me how I imagine fire might taste. Typically I like spicy food if it has a good flavor.  I don't find this to be the case with this soup. Any flavor is killed off by the burn. 
 Polarity: Negative

Ive noticed that my dog has had more frequent bowel movement than usual. He is on a strict schedule for potty break and has been very good on it for the past 4 years until i tried this food. Now he poops in my apt in front of us because he has to go so bad, like the poster above, its one hell of a laxative when my very well trained yorkie cant even hold it in 
 Polarity: Negative

Bought this mix along with the Cuisinart waffle maker.  Delicious.  We followed the directions and it made only one Belgian waffle.  The next time we doubled the recipe and it came out the right amount.  Good flavor and easy to use. 
 Polarity: Positive

I've been enjoying BTT for 50 years-since I was a little kid! Loved Vanilla and Banana best!  Great stuff-frig and smash!!! Just got some in Los Angeles last year, and Guess What!  It Tastes like PLASTIC!!! Excuse me!!! Plastic tastes WAY better! So...if I want the Real Deal, I'll enjoy Charleston Chew which is...a million times better and more Natural than your Plastic!!! Wretched!!! Congrats on ruining a memory! You and Broadway Strawberry Rolls-ABsolute Crap!!!!!!!  REAL Crap!!!!!  iRa 
 Polarity: Positive

i love this product cant find it locally. Sometimes little out of the way stores have it.But i also love the chicken,pork chop bags.Every store i go in i look for them the lastplace i found it was at a meat market. 
 Polarity: Positive
